name: ZaraTHUD
body:
## Intervention
Wrapping Up. In the end, did not find a lot of material on the technical side. Had some copyright related conversations, which helped reinforce some of what I knew, but not a lot of new information. 

The convention still has a lot of fun elements -- games and movies and chatty panels -- that I enjoy, and a lot of FanTek and Katsu friends. And, of course, I got to hang out with Auri, who's a good roommate. So I did have fun.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
